answers.answer: Hello,this a1c is not terrible, but is an average bs of 108, which is higher than normal.  Truely normal  A1c is 4.1 - 4.6.  So there is room for improvement still.That said, many doctors would not be too concerned with an A1C less than 6.Please keep working to improve it.
You're fine. The goal given me was less than 7%. My last was 5.3% and the doctor told me I had reversed my diabetes in that my numbers were those of a non-diabetic . Not cured but reversed

question: hello everyone.My A1C is 5.8% . ...Three months back it was 5.9%... Is it ok or i need to lower it down more... Am i alright or  this reading is effecting my body parts at present ???
title: My A1C is 5.8 % ....  Guide me ??
